.mov's??  wtf. in the future don't upload .mov's .. not only are they abstract and no devices play them, they very easily infected by virus's, malware and trojen's, manually and automatically by bot's and spider's, that spread by themselves through IM, email, P2P, FTP, and bitorrent, and most of the time free of any detection by ANY antivirus software (mac, linux or PC).
.mov's are like a plague you can't get rid of.
...also, in hindsight, I should have labeled this as "encoded in xvid, wrapped in .mov containers"
